title: FOX XL Mudguard extends protection for your latest 36 & 38 mountain bike fork
content:
Better protection is here for the latest FOX 36 & 38 forks thanks to the new XL Mudguard. Extending the seal & stanchion protection of their standard short mudguard, the new XL offers 85% more coverage for those who ride in wetter, muddier condition, still with the same clean no-zip-tie setup. The post FOX XL Mudguard extends protection for your latest 36 & 38 mountain bike fork appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
